title: ReXGradient-160K: A Large-Scale Publicly Available Dataset of Chest Radiographs with Free-text Reports
details: X Zhang, JN Acosta, J Miller, O Huang, P Rajpurkar - arXiv preprint arXiv:2505.00228, 2025
abstract: We present ReXGradient-160K, representing the largest publicly available chest X- ray dataset to date in terms of the number of patients. This dataset contains 160,000 chest X-ray studies with paired radiological reports from 109,487 unique patients …

title: Diabetic retinopathy detection based on mobile maxout network and weber local descriptor feature selection using retinal fundus image
details: V Sheejakumari, K Sundravadivelu, S Pushparani… - Scientific Reports, 2025
abstract: Retinal screening provides for earlier detection of diabetic retinopathy (DR) as well as prompt diagnosis. Recognizing DR utilizing color fundus imaging needs qualified specialists to know about the presence and significance of a few insignificant …

title: Sub-Perfluorocarbon Ophthalmic Viscoelastic Injection (SPOT) technique for macular hole retinal detachment surgery
details: HD Chou, WM Teh, KJ Chen, YS Hwang, L Liu… - BMC ophthalmology, 2025
abstract: Purpose Macular hole with retinal detachment (MHRD) often presents in highly myopic eyes and is one of the most challenging macular condition. Previously, we reported the preliminary results of using the sub-perfluorocarbon liquid ocular …
